tha-ap3:6.4: sobhayanti → sobhayantā (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); patāyanti sobhayantā (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap3:23.3: Pammakā → pampakā (bj, csp1ed); campakā (sya1ed, sya2ed); sampakā (pts-vp-pli1); cammakā (mr)
tha-ap3:25.2: camarā gaṇḍakā bahū → vakā bheraṇḍakā bahū (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); vakabheraṇḍakā bahū (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap3:25.3: sukapotā → suggapotā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); puggapotā (si); suttapotā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap3:28.2: madhuke → madhukā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, csp1ed); madhuke (pts-vp-pli1) | kāsumāriyo → kāsamāriyo (sya1ed, sya2ed); sumāriyo (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap3:29.1: Kosambā → kosumbhā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | saḷalā nimbā → salalā nīpā (bj); salaḷā nīpā (sya1ed, sya2ed); saḷalā nīpā (pts-vp-pli1); panasā ambā (?)
tha-ap3:47.2: pubbavidehakaṃ → pubbavidehanaṃ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
tha-ap3:84.2: pathavī cākhilājaṭaṃ → paṭhaviṃ cākhilaṃ jahe (bj); paṭhaviñcākhilañjahe (sya1ed, sya2ed); paṭhaviṃ cākhilañjahe (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap3:111.1: Pacchime bhavasampatte → pacchimabhave sampatte (bj); pacchimebhave sampatte (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap3:132.1: Attakāramayaṃ etaṃ → atthakāmaṃ mamaṃ etaṃ (si); atthakāmaṃ mamametaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); atthakāramayaṃ (mr)
tha-ap3:151.2: Paccabyatha → paccabyathā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); paccabyattha (^pi-tv-kd1#220 [Mahākhandhaka/ Sāriputtamoggallānapabbajjākathā], ^pi-tv-kd1#227 [Mahākhandhaka/ Sāriputtamoggallānapabbajjākathā])
tha-ap3:156.3: Dantova dantadamatho → dantova dantadamathe (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); dantovuttamadamathe (si); dantoca uttamadamathe (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap3:157.3: adhigacchesi → adhigacchāhi (bj); adhigacchasi (si); adhigacchehi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); adhigatosi (?)
tha-ap3:184.3: Sabbā velaṃva phusanti → sabbāva velaṃ phusanti (bj); sabbavelaṃ paphussanti (sya1ed, sya2ed); sabbavelam paphusanti (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap3:198.3: Catuddisānuviloketvā → catuddisā viloketvā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); catuddisānuloketvā (mr)
tha-ap3:205.3: vicinantā → vicintentā (bj); vicintenti (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); vicinantaṃ (mr)
tha-ap3:208.3: na sakkeyyuṃ → na kappeyyuṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); na pappeyyum (pts-vp-pli1); na pappeyyuṃ (mr)
tha-ap3:213.4: jhāpayī mama → jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ (bj, mr); jhāpayiṃ mama (si); jhāpayiṃ mamaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); jhāpayī mamaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap3:222.1: Samāpattīnaṃ kusalo → samāpattinayakusalo (bj); samāpattivinayakusalo (si, pts-vp-pli1); samāpattimhi kusalo (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap3:223.1: Sāvakaguṇenapi phussena → sāvakaguṇenāpi phussena (bj); sāvakaguṇenāpi phusena (si, pts-vp-pli1); sāvakaguṇaphussena (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap3:223.2: parisuttamabhāravā → purisuttamagāravā (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); purisuttamabhāravā (mr)
tha-ap3:225.2: vasumatīpi → vasumatī (bj, mr); vasu patīnaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap3:234.1: imā dve gāthāyo sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
